questions.title: Is there a master cleaning schedule/programme in place?
Are the cleaning and sanitising chemicals/materials in use, only food approved ones? (Shell requirements: only Rentokil, Ecolab or Hychem chemicals can be used)
Are all cleaning and sanitising containers clearly labelled with the 1) Product information, 2) Supplierâ€™s name, 3) Instructions for use. No storage in food containers.
Are cleaning and sanitising materials available to staff throughout the day. Is sanitiser solution e.g. spray bottles available in food preparation areas?
Are sanitisers mixed/diluted as per the instructions to ensure they are effective? (correct concentration levels)
Are disposable cloths in use? And what is the condition of surface cloths?
Cleaning equipment should be clearly identifiable. Are equipment used for food preparation areas kept separate than those used for toilets and outside areas?
Are cleaning equipment stored in a specific area and is this area kept in a neat and clean condition?
